item.title: 美国特使称与印度的贸易协议分歧将得到解决
item.description: 美国和印度是亲密伙伴，双方将解决分歧，包括长期拖延的贸易协议问题。美国总统特朗普政府新任命的驻印度大使塞尔吉奥·戈尔如是说。【原文：US and India are close partners and will resolve their differences, including over a long delayed trade deal, said Sergio Gor, the new US Ambassador to India appointed by President Donald Trump’s administration.】

item.title: 中国境内股市成交额飙升至创纪录的5160亿美元
item.description: 周一，上海和深圳股市成交额达到3.6万亿元人民币（合5160亿美元）的历史新高，中国股市的动物精神持续高涨。【原文：Stock turnover in Shanghai and Shenzhen reached an all-time high on Monday of 3.6 trillion yuan ($516 billion) as animal spirits continue to mount in Chinese equities.】

item.title: Palantir联合创始人隆斯代尔将投资尼日利亚无人机制造商
item.description: 帕兰提尔科技公司联合创始人乔·朗斯代尔带领投资者押注一家鲜为人知的尼日利亚国防初创企业。随着暴力极端主义在非洲蔓延，该公司正扩大无人机制造规模。【原文：Palantir Technologies Inc. co-founder Joe Lonsdale led investors betting on a little-known Nigerian defense startup that’s expanding drone manufacturing as violent extremism spreads across Africa.】

item.title: 喜力首席执行官辞职，啤酒销量下滑重创啤酒商
item.description: 喜力啤酒公司首席执行官多尔夫·范登布林克宣布辞职，此前数月该公司因啤酒销量下滑发布盈利预警。【原文：Heineken NV Chief Executive Officer Dolf van den Brink is stepping down months after the brewer issued a profit warning amid a slump in beer sales.】

item.title: 英镑小幅走高，美联储威胁打压美元
美联储传票重启"卖给美国"交易，因对自主权的担忧
item.description: 周一，特朗普政府加剧对美联储的攻击，引发市场对央行独立性的担忧，"抛售美国资产"情绪席卷全球市场。【原文：‘Sell America’ sentiment swept through markets on Monday after the Trump administration escalated its attacks on the Federal Reserve, fueling concerns over central bank autonomy.】

item.title: 印度航天局火箭一年内第二次发射失败
item.description: 印度航天局在2026年伊始遭遇挫折，其火箭第二次未能进入预定轨道，凸显了该国航天雄心的挑战。【原文：India’s space agency began 2026 with a setback after its rocket failed for the second time to achieve the desired orbit, underscoring challenges to the country’s ambitions.】

item.title: 据称小鹏汽车已聘请银行为其飞行汽车部门在香港上市筹备
item.description: 知情人士透露，小鹏汽车已聘请银行为其飞行汽车业务在香港进行首次公开募股（IPO）提供服务。【原文：Xpeng Inc. has hired banks to work on an initial public offering of its flying car unit in Hong Kong, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 梅洛尼称委内瑞拉已释放两名意大利囚犯
item.description: 意大利总理乔尔吉娅·梅洛尼周一凌晨表示，委内瑞拉已释放两名意大利囚犯。【原文：Venezuela has freed two Italian prisoners, Italian Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni said early Monday.】

item.title: 杭州六人组科技初创企业BrainCo据悉将申请在香港上市
item.description: 知情人士透露，BrainCo已秘密提交香港首次公开募股申请，有望成为中国所谓"杭州六家"中首家上市的企业。【原文：BrainCo has filed confidentially for a Hong Kong initial public offering, according to people familiar with the matter, putting it on track to be the first of China’s so-called Hangzhou Six to trade publicly.】

item.title: 伦敦金融城上季度招聘人数下滑，英国预算案即将公布
item.description: 摩根麦金莱报告显示，2025年第四季度伦敦金融城企业招聘活动放缓，因英国预算及全球市场的不确定性导致职位空缺较前期下降13%。【原文：City of London firms held back on hiring in the last quarter of 2025 as uncertainty around the UK budget and global markets led to a 13% drop in job vacancies compared to the prior period, according to a report by Morgan McKinley.】

item.title: 前F1冠军尼科·罗斯伯格为风投公司筹集1亿美元
item.description: 前一级方程式赛车冠军尼科·罗斯伯格为其风险投资公司筹集了1亿美元资金，使其成为前运动员中规模最大的科技投资者之一。【原文：Nico Rosberg, a former Formula 1 racing champion, has raised $100 million for his venture capital firm, making it one of the largest technology investors from a former athlete.】

item.title: 国际资金涌入中东，风险投资创历史新高
item.description: 2025年，随着国际资本涌入中东地区，该地区风险投资资金创下历史新高，成功抵御了其他新兴市场普遍出现的融资低迷态势。【原文：Middle East venture capital funding hit record highs in 2025 as international capital poured into the region, helping it defy the fundraising slump seen across other emerging markets.】

item.title: 德意志银行25亿美元印度零售资产招致最终竞标
item.description: 据知情人士透露，德意志银行印度零售资产及财富管理业务已收到科塔克马辛德拉银行和联邦银行的约束性收购要约。随着外国银行纷纷退出竞争激烈的印度银行业，本土金融机构正积极把握收购机遇。【原文：Deutsche Bank AG’s India retail assets and wealth management have drawn binding bids from Kotak Mahindra Bank Ltd. and Federal Bank Ltd., according to people familiar with the matter, as the local lenders pounce on opportunities from foreign players seeking to exit the crowded banking market.】

item.title: 中国电池股因出口退税削减计划下跌
item.description: 中国电池股价下跌，此前北京公布了削减出口退税的计划，而韩国材料公司股价则上涨。【原文：Chinese battery shares fell after Beijing unveiled a plan to reduce export tax rebates, while South Korean materials companies advanced.】

item.title: 欧洲与中国的芯片争端正走向临界点
item.description:
一场围绕技术转让的争端将一家荷兰芯片制造商一分为二，并引发了一场生存之战。

【原文：

A spat over technology transfers has split a Dutch chipmaker in two and triggered a race for survival.

】

item.title: 起诉鲍威尔将创下新低且毫无益处
item.description:
这种霸凌毫无意义，其影响已从美联储蔓延至整个美国经济。【原文：

The bullying is pointless and extends beyond the Fed to the US economy. 

】

item.title: 现代机器人公司聘请银行为韩国首次公开募股提供服务
item.description: 现代机器人公司已聘请银行机构筹备其在韩国的首次公开募股，此时正值全球企业竞相开发类人机器人之际。【原文：HD Hyundai Robotics Co. has hired banks to work on its South Korea initial public offering at a time when global companies are racing to develop human-like robots.】

item.title: 印度尼西亚计划发行2026年首只亚洲主权美元债券
item.description: 印度尼西亚计划发行美元债券，这将是今年亚洲主权国家首次此类发债，将为2026年全球债务发行创纪录的开局再添动力。【原文：Indonesia plans to sell US-dollar bonds, the first such offering by an Asian sovereign this year, giving further impetus to a record start to global debt issuance by borrowers in 2026.】

item.title: 美团、阿里巴巴股价大涨，中国政府正寻求遏制价格战
item.description: 中国最大外卖平台股价上涨，因国家最高反垄断机构启动对该行业竞争行为的调查，市场由此期待监管部门将遏制补贴驱动的价格战。【原文：Shares of China’s biggest food-delivery firms climbed as the nation’s top antitrust body launched a probe into competition practices in the sector, spurring hopes that authorities will rein in subsidy-driven price wars.】

item.title: 花旗称印尼今年赤字可能突破3%法定上限
item.description: 花旗集团表示，随着政府加大对全国免费供餐计划的投入，以及对苏门答腊岛受洪水影响省份的重建力度，印度尼西亚今年的财政赤字很可能大幅超出法定限额。【原文：Indonesia’s fiscal deficit is likely to widen well beyond its legal limit this year as the government ramps up spending on its nationwide free meals program and the rebuilding of flood-hit provinces in Sumatra island, according to Citigroup Inc.】

item.title: 瑞迪恩在中国卸载必和必拓铁矿石，交易商测试限制措施
item.description: 一艘满载必和必拓集团金伯利铁矿石的散货船在中国卸货，此前该船在近海闲置数周。尽管价格争议仍在持续，但贸易商仍坚持运送受限货物，此类情况实属罕见。【原文：A bulk carrier laden with BHP Group’s Jimblebar iron ore has discharged in China after weeks idling offshore, in a rare case of a trader pressing ahead with restricted cargoes despite an ongoing pricing dispute.】

item.title: 铁矿石价格上涨，补库需求与生铁产量提升市场情绪
item.description: 铁矿石价格上涨，得益于节前钢铁厂的补货需求以及生铁产量的提升。【原文：Iron ore advanced, buoyed by pre-holiday restocking from steel mills and a lift in hot-metal output.】

item.title: 印度新股上市激增 推高IPO费用至历史新高
item.description: 去年印度首次公开募股（IPO）承销费创下4.17亿美元的纪录，反映出股票上市数量激增，且商业文化正逐步摆脱低价驱动的模式。【原文：Investment banks earned a record $417 million underwriting fees for initial public offerings in India last year, reflecting a surge in stock listings and a gradual shift away from a business culture driven by low prices.】

item.title: 亚洲股市受美国就业报告提振走高，韩国股市创历史新高
item.description: 新兴亚洲股市周一上涨，此前美国就业数据低于预期，推动股市上周五创下新高。【原文：Emerging-Asian equities gained on Monday after a lower-than-expected US jobs print pushed stocks to fresh highs on Friday.】

item.title: 铜价逼近历史高位，因供应担忧与美元走软
item.description: 铜价逼近历史高位，基本金属本周以看涨态势开局，得益于供应担忧和美元走软的支撑。【原文：Copper rose toward a record, as base metals opened the week in bullish form aided by concerns over supplies and a weaker dollar.】

item.title: 中国重启大豆拍卖，同时继续从美国采购
item.description: 中国重启大豆拍卖——此前曾暂停三周——此举显然旨在清理仓储空间，因中美达成贸易休战后，中国持续从美国采购大豆。【原文：China is restarting soybean auctions — after a three-week pause — in an apparent attempt to clear storage space as it keeps buying from the US following the trade truce between the two countries.】

item.title: 新西兰银行表示，2026年新西兰房价将小幅上涨
item.description: 新西兰银行表示，尽管经济正在复苏，但该国住房市场缺乏动力，今年房价涨幅仅为2.1%。【原文：New Zealand’s housing market lacks momentum and prices will rise just 2.1% this year despite an economic recovery, according to Bank of New Zealand.】

item.title: B.Grimm以2.3亿美元收购美国水电运营商25%股权
item.description: B.Grimm Power Pcl以2.3亿美元收购了New England Reliable Hydropower Holdings LLC的25%股权，标志着这家泰国电力生产商在拓展海外市场可再生能源业务版图方面又迈出重要一步。【原文：B.Grimm Power Pcl has acquired a 25% stake in New England Reliable Hydropower Holdings LLC for $230 million, marking another step in the Thai power producer’s push to expand its renewable energy footprint in overseas markets.】

item.title: 印度股市抛售加剧，股票交易员寻求盈利契机
item.description: 共同基金投资者变得挑剔，分散投资。【原文：Mutual fund investors turn selective, spread bets.】
